20101228020557.000|20101228020559.000|CC1|FOOTHILLS ARE BARE FROM THE 2009
20101228020559.000|20101228020601.000|CC1|STATION FIRE, THE BASINS IN THIS

20101228020605.000|20101228020606.000|CC1|BOULDERS, TREES, BRANCHES AND

20101228020621.000|20101228020622.000|CC1|TO BE COMING IN, WEDNESDAY      
20101228020622.000|20101228020623.000|CC1|MORNING, EARLY MORNING, SO WE   
20101228020623.000|20101228020626.000|CC1|MAY HAVE TO HALT OUR OPERATIONS 
20101228020626.000|20101228020627.000|CC1|AT THAT POINT AND THEN TRY TO   
20101228020627.000|20101228020629.000|CC1|RESUME IT AS QUICK AS WE CAN.   
20101228020629.000|20101228020630.000|CC1|THURSDAY WE'LL ALSO BE ABLE TO  
20101228020630.000|20101228020631.000|CC1|WORK ALL DAY.                   
20101228020631.000|20101228020633.000|CC1|WE ANTICIPATE HAVING THE        
20101228020633.000|20101228020634.000|CC1|MAJORITY OF IT OUT BY THE END OF
20101228020634.000|20101228020635.000|CC1|THURSDAY, EVEN IF WE DON'T HAVE 
20101228020635.000|20101228020637.000|CC1|TO WORK WEDNESDAY.              
20101228020637.000|20101228020641.000|CC1|>> NOW, K-RAILS ARE ALSO IN
